args: Will Bitcoin reach $100,000 by end of 2025?

devdoc.details: Uses Zama fhEVM for homomorphic encryption with async decryption via Gateway

aggregateBets().details: Only callable by owner after commitment deadline

callbackAggregateDecryption(uint256,byte.details: Called by the decryption oracle with decrypted values

callbackTokenAllocation(uint256,bytes,by.details: Called by the decryption oracle to allocate tokens to a user

claimRewards().details: Winners receive their proportional share of the total pool

params._commitmentDuration: Duration of the blind commitment phase (in seconds)
params._eventDescription: Description of the event to predict
params._eventDuration: Duration until the event occurs (in seconds)

returns.tokensOut: Amount of NO tokens that would be received

params.tokenAmount: Amount of NO tokens to sell

returns.ethOut: Amount of ETH that would be received

returns.tokensOut: Amount of YES tokens that would be received

params.tokenAmount: Amount of YES tokens to sell

returns.ethOut: Amount of ETH that would be received

requestAggregateDecryption().details: This initiates async decryption through the KMS

requestTokenAllocation().details: Users must call this after price discovery to get their YES/NO tokens

params.tokenAmount: Amount of NO tokens to sell
Amount of YES tokens to sell

params.outcome: The final outcome: true = YES won, false = NO won

devdoc.title: BlindOracle - Privacy-Preserving Prediction Market

HandlesAlreadySavedForRequestID().notice: Returned if some handles were already saved for corresponding ID.

InvalidKMSSignatures().notice: Returned if the returned KMS signatures are not valid.

NoHandleFoundForRequestID().notice: Returned if there was not handle found for the requested ID.

DecryptionFulfilled(uint256).notice: This event is emitted when requested decryption has been fulfilled.

aggregateBets().notice: Step 1: Aggregate all encrypted bets using FHE operations

buyNoTokens(uint256).notice: Buy NO tokens using constant product AMM

buyYesTokens(uint256).notice: Buy YES tokens using constant product AMM

callbackAggregateDecryption(uint256,byte.notice: Callback function for aggregate decryption results

callbackTokenAllocation(uint256,bytes,by.notice: Callback function for token allocation decryption

commitPrediction(bytes32,bytes32,bytes,b.notice: Submit an encrypted prediction and bet amount

eventDeadline().notice: Deadline for the event (after which settlement can occur)

finalOutcome().notice: Final outcome: true = YES won, false = NO won

getMyCommitment().notice: Get my encrypted commitment (only callable by the user who committed)

getNoBuyQuote(uint256).notice: Get quote for buying NO tokens

getNoSellQuote(uint256).notice: Get quote for selling NO tokens

getYesBuyQuote(uint256).notice: Get quote for buying YES tokens

getYesSellQuote(uint256).notice: Get quote for selling YES tokens

hasClaimed(address).notice: Track if user has claimed rewards

hasTokensAllocated(address).notice: Check if user's tokens have been allocated

initialPrice().notice: Initial price after price discovery (scaled by 1e18)

isSettled().notice: Whether the market has been settled

noTokenBalance(address).notice: NO token balance for each user

owner().notice: Market owner (can trigger phase transitions and settlement)

requestAggregateDecryption().notice: Step 2: Request decryption of aggregated totals via Gateway

requestTokenAllocation().notice: Request token allocation for a user based on their encrypted commitment

sellNoTokens(uint256,uint256).notice: Sell NO tokens back to the AMM

sellYesTokens(uint256,uint256).notice: Sell YES tokens back to the AMM

settleMarket(bool).notice: Settle the market with the final outcome

yesTokenBalance(address).notice: YES token balance for each user

userdoc.notice: A production-ready prediction market with three phases: Blind Commitment, Price Discovery, and Free Trading
